title: Scarlet Sins An Erotic Dark Anthology of Vampires
description: His fangs extend and graze her neck, leaving a trail of blood…he is a creature of the night, one that leaves her longing and lusting for more. Scarlet Sins will allow you a look inside the world of the erotic and beautiful creatures that crave not only blood, but sex and power. Each story will open your eyes to the sinful tales of vampires seducing their victims, taking their blood and their bodies for their own use…Bodies entwined in blood soaked sheets, she licks his chest, running her tongue to his neck, barely breathing, life slipping…she laughs, she holds power…Scarlet Sins will leave you with a throbbing between your thighs, wishing it was a set of fangs buried deep within.Join us as we take you into a world of sinister desires, and follow the trail of blood from one page to the next. But don’t worry...they don’t bite…hard…
author: Zoey Sweete
